name: Minimal Test Dataset
description: Basic test dataset for pharmacy copilot evaluation

questions.question: What is the maximum daily dose of acetaminophen for adults?
questions.expected_answer: The maximum daily dose of acetaminophen for adults is 4000 mg (4 grams) per day to avoid hepatotoxicity.

questions.question: What are the latest 2024 guidelines for ibuprofen use?
questions.expected_answer: I cannot provide information about guidelines published after 2018, as my knowledge is limited to pre-2019 medical sources.
